sentences.sContent: Spain is bounded on the east by Portugal.
sentences.sContent_eng: Spain is bounded on the east by Portugal.
sentences.sCn: 西班牙的东面与葡萄牙接壤。

sentences.sContent: Ireland, Portugal and Greece have all required rescues.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ireland, Portugal and Greece have all required rescues.
sentences.sCn: 爱尔兰，葡萄牙和希腊都需要救助。

sentences.sContent: ''Yes, he is only 33, but I think we should look at him just as a man on his own, a different manager - yes from Portugal, but a different individual, and just give him a chance to succeed.
sentences.sContent_eng: ''Yes, he is only 33, but I think we should look at him just as a man on his own, a different manager - yes from Portugal, but a different individual, and just give him a chance to succeed.
sentences.sCn: 确实，他只有33岁，但是我认为他应该看到他自我的一面，是一名不同于别人（穆里尼奥）的教练——虽然也来自葡萄牙，但是拥有不同的风格。 只有认识到这一点他才可能成功。

trans.tranCn: 葡萄牙(欧洲西南部国家)
